messages.title: Elect a Local Champion
messages.content: Standing up for our local area - including the successful campaign to save Purley Pool. Has real world experience having set up his first business at 24. Making sure Croydon continues to benefit from the economic recovery, with more jobs.

issues.economy: Making sure Croydon continues to benefit from the economic recovery, with more jobs.

housing.content: Standing up for our local area - including the successful campaign to save Purley Pool.

images.caption: Chris Philp with supporters and with Boris Johnson.
